title: 1880's George Woods Card: Please help identify
author: DinoPro

posts.post_title: 1880's George Woods Card: Please help identify
posts.post_content:
Hi all....I am a collector who favor's the 1950's and 1960's Cards ( Being that I grew up in the 50's & 60's )! So, please forgive me if I do not know my late 1800's baseball....

I have these 2 cards. They each measure ( Approx. 2 1/8" x 3 1/8"+ )
Blank Backs...Although the back of cards are darker than the image shows below.

Any ideas on who produced these 2 old relics?
DinoPro
I recommend posting this on the main forum...  You will get more responses...  This is the Buy/Sell/Trade section...
this topic is posted everywhere!  Maybe it should be posted in the 1980's-current category too?

[quote name="ullmandds" post=756282]this topic is posted everywhere!  Maybe it should be posted in the 19880's-current category too?[/QUOTE]

They are fake cards made to look like Kalamazoo Bats Cabinets that were originally 4x6 inches and would sell in the thousands of dollars.......
FYI......Tom
